text: César Augusto Castro Paiva (born 24 April 1966 in Asunción, Paraguay) is a former Central Defender, and coach. ==Career== Castro played for most his career in Olimpia Asunción where he won several national and international championships such as the Copa Libertadores and Supercopa Sudamericana. ==Titles== ===As player=== {| class="wikitable" !Season !Team !Title |- |1990|| Olimpia|| Copa Libertadores |- |1990|| Olimpia|| Supercopa Sudamericana |- |1990|| Olimpia|| Recopa Sudamericana |- |1992|| Olimpia|| Torneo República |- |1993|| Olimpia|| Paraguay 1st division |- |1995|| Olimpia|| Paraguay 1st division |} ===External Links=== *. title: César Castro (footballer)
